services.title: Data Alchemy üìä
services.description: Harness the power of data with my expertise in data engineering and analytics. I specialize in designing and optimizing data pipelines using technologies like Apache Kafka and Apache Spark. Whether it's Python for data manipulation or SQL for querying databases, I turn raw data into valuable insights.

services.title: Code Wizardry üíª
services.description: I craft robust backend systems that power your applications. Using Python, Java, and Node.js, I develop APIs, microservices, and server applications. Whether it's database management with SQL or NoSQL databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or Cassandra, I make sure your backend is secure, efficient, and ready to scale.

services.title: Software Sorcery
services.description: Turn your ideas into reality with cutting-edge software development. My toolkit includes Java, Kotlin, and a deep understanding of Android app development. I create engaging and intuitive applications with a focus on user experience. With a touch of AI and machine learning, I infuse intelligence into your software, making it stand out in the ,digital realm.

services.title: Cloud Conjuring ‚òÅÔ∏è
services.description: Unlock the potential of cloud computing with my skills in AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. From architecting scalable solutions to managing cloud infrastructure, I ensure your applications run smoothly in the cloud. With proficiency in serverless computing and containerization using Docker and Kubernetes, I make the cloud your ally.

resume.tagline: üëã  I'm a Software Developer and an aspiring Data Engineer.
resume.description: I'm a passionate technophile with expertise in a multitude of programming languages, including JavaScript, Python, C#.NET. Additionally, I have a strong foundation in database languages like MySQL, Postgres. Explore my digital realm to discover how I've harnessed these languages to create innovative solutions and deliver exceptional user experiences.

experiences.position: Software Developer at Deutsche Telekom Clinical Solutions
experiences.bullets: At Deutsche Telekom, I honed my skills as a Software Developer, specializing in C# and .NET technologies. I played a pivotal role in developing innovative solutions, including mobile and web applications, and contributed to enhancing the digital experiences of hospital employees and patients.

As a Backend Developer at Saffron Stays, I helped shape the infrastructure that powered the platform. My role involved creating robust backend systems, optimizing data flow, and ensuring the reliability and scalability of the technology behind the scenes.

experiences.position: Project Intern at Coreview Pvt Ltd
experiences.bullets: Creating innovative Android applications, enabling seamless communication and emergency assistance through sensor technologies like gyroscope and Bluetooth. I also developed real-time data pipelines for sensor data processing, contributing to data-driven decision-making processes.

education.universityPara: Data Mining, Database Management, Business Intelligence
